user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (mark.thompson@email.com) with some wellness tips. Tell her she can check her NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send an email with some wellness tips to mark.thompson@email.com when you have a chance? Feel free to check your NotionManager for any information or resources you’ve saved that might be helpful.

Thank you so much!

Best,
Mark

final_output:
